name: CommVault
description: The CommVault plugin fetches alerts with from CommVault Threat Analysis and pushes to Netskope CTE. The plugin supports sharing Indicators to CommVault via CommVault REST API..

configuration.label: Webservice URL
configuration.description: CommVault Webservice URL which alerts are pushed to/pulled from For eg: 'http://cvwebservice.nam.contoso.com:81/SearchSvc/CVWebService.svc'

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the data for the initial run.

configuration.label: Anomalous Event String Filter
configuration.description: The Event Code String for amolaous events to be pulled from CommVault
